txt.en: Rhadrog has asked you to use the Haerondir Horn in certain places around Haerondir, and to use it to scare nearby curious Orcs.
Rhadrog can be found in Haerondir.\n\nYou should speak with Rhadrog.
Use the Haerondir Horn at horn-blowing spots in Haerondir.
Curious Orcs can be found outside of Haerondir.\n\nUse the Haerondir Horn to spook curious Orcs who have wandered too close to Haerondir.

'I told you it was fun! Orcs are such cowards. Haerondir should remain unbothered by them for the time being. Should we return from the coming battle, and I remain hopeful we will, we will not find this ruin has become a stronghold for any remaining Orcs!'

'Another way we keep those Orcs out of here is with the use of eerie-sounding instruments. Here's one of them: the Haerondir Horn! There's a few places in Haerondir that have excellent acoustics. Go blow the horn in those places, and after that, see if you can find any curious Orcs that have strayed too close. Sneak up behind them, and blow the horn! Keeping the fear in them keeps us safe. I'll admit, it's also a bit of fun, but don't tell Anborn I said that.'
Blow Haerondir Horn at horn-blowing spots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
